attributes.action: Make it standard packaging ingredients lists include suitability for diet needs
attributes.additional_details: Upon trying being vegan for January to diversify and usher in healthier eating in the new year, I've faced difficulty finding and being confident in choices while shopping without looking up online if ingredients and E numbers within foods are vegan.
attributes.background:
All good packaging should include on ingredients list if it's sutible for key dietary eating requirements: vegetarian, gluten intolerance and vegan ect. 

Some packaging includes this already, but makes it difficult when some do and don't.
